name: Happy Santa
description:
Happy Santa - is a simple 2D platformer with elements of survival. You play for a Jolly Santa Claus who wants to give gifts to children of all the earth, but firstly you will need to collect these gifts. By gathering the right number of gifts at the level you have the door to Santa's house, going through which, you will be taken to the next level. Be careful on your way there are many traps and obstacles, and only one life. If you die accidentally, do not worry, the level will restart and you will be able to try to pass it again.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Animated graphics.
  • Simple, funny gameplay.
  • A large number of levels.
